action.action-desc: Mr. Reed (for himself and Mr. Thompson of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the 7-year recovery period for motorsports entertainment complexes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Motorsports Fairness and Permanency Act.

section.header: 7-year recovery period for motorsports entertainment complexes made permanent

subsection.text: Section 168(i)(15) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (D).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2016.
